Quickstrike:








Quickstrike kept his face straight at Megatron with his eyes burning their 
bright crimson. "Ah ain't gonna give you them codes, boss. Ah don't trust 
ya." It took a lot of nerve to say that. "If ya want me t' do somethin' wit' 
that ship, ask me t', but ah's ain't gonna tell ya th' codes. If that 
tin-horn, Hell Beast finds out, ah's gonna be uh dead bot. By th' way, if 
that butt kisser ya got by yer side wants t' shoot me, he's gonna get shot 
right back by them auto-guns." He paused for a second, and commanded: 
"Computer, target units Shredder an' diagnostic drone." The auto-guns 
followed his orders and swerved around to the two Predacons. "Fire on 
movements." he said to it. He transformed to his beast mode, his left claw 
hanging at an awkward angle. He grunted at the pain of the shifting of 
parts. "Tell me when ya wanna behave." he said, and clawed off to the 
entrance of the ship.

There was something funny about his code thing---there was none. The 
computer relied on him, and acted as the Darkside. It rejected commands from 
Hell Beast's troops, and listened to Megatron's.

Now there were plans to be had.
